data.text: @MartijnB_81 @ccMoxy @Thestace06 @nzherald My thoughts are if the vaccine would stop or slow transmission, how is it that according to newshub that vaccinated are in hospital with covid? Now I believe in science but numbers never lie... Unless there rigged??
@matroked @nzherald She changed her mind.  Get over yourself.

@MarkStewartNZ @TheNzRocketeer @nzherald Mark our whole covid response from 2020 has been based on the stats if death "with" covid.  Ie. Lockdowns.

Why not have the same logic for vaccines?
@nzherald I just think she’s as thick as a very thick plank of wood!🤣
@Freedom_chooser @thedansho @nzherald I don't agree. Sorry. This is why. https://t.co/UNtISP4WXv
@Thestace06 @nzherald https://t.co/6uWSjjq7yd Honestly, tell me you still agree with forced vaccination after you look at all the people affected. #VaccineSideEffects
@nzherald https://t.co/6uWSjjq7yd Does no one see this? This is one of MANY who are affected, and yet you justify forced vaccination for the health of the vulnerable?

@nzherald I don't get it, her being vaccinated doesn't mean people around her aren't at risk, there's still a risk either way. But people want her to put herself at risk of side effects, for their own selfish reasons? For their own body? And that's a justification?
